name: caddy Chef cookbook
readme:
caddy Cookbook ============== This cookbook installs and runs caddy webserver https://caddyserver.com Requirements ------------ #### cookbooks - `ark` Attributes ---------- #### caddy::default
Key Type Description Default
['caddy']['features'] Array features to download and install with caddy []
['caddy']['email'] String email to use with registration in letsencryt nil
['caddy']['hosts'] Hash Caddyfile in form of Hash {}
Usage ----- #### caddy::default ##### Set eMail - ['caddy']['email'] Set your eMail to register with letsencryt for HTTPS Support ##### Write your Caddyfile - ['caddy']['hosts'] ```ruby { 'localhost:80' => { 'log' => 'localhost.log' } 'localhost:8080' => { 'log' => 'localhost_alt.log' } } ``` ##### (Optional} Add features Add features to be downloaded, e.g. ```ruby ['cors','git'] ``` then include `caddy` in your node's `run_list`: ```json { "name":"my_node", "run_list": [ "recipe[caddy]" ] } ``` Contributing ------------ TODO: (optional) If this is a public cookbook, detail the process for contributing.
